MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G4 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:22pm due to faulty electrical equipment on West Princes Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:43am on Friday, 26 March 2021
